result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven R. Daniels

defendant.name: Daniels, Steven R.

records.addlTxt:
1:05 PM Defendant Steven R. Daniels in court.  Attorney Patrick Joseph Stangl appeared by video for Steven R. Daniels.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances. Court reviews history. Voluntary appearance. Atty Stangl makes statement, requests court quash warrant. Court makes statement. Marcoux makes statement, no objection. Court reviews status with parties. Off the record for scheduling. Stangl makes statement on future motions. Setting status on 11/7. DE in person, Stangl by video. Review scheduling of motion and jury trial. Warrant is quashed. Adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Voluntary appearance on October 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

8:37 AM Defendant Steven R. Daniels not in court.  Attorney Patrick Joseph Stangl appeared by phone for Steven R. Daniels.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. No appearance by defendant. Atty Stangl speaks to the court re: defendant's non-appearance. Off record @ 8:38 AM Back on record at 8:41 AM  Atty Stangl speaks to the court. State requests a warrant-but no objection to staying. Court orders Warrant-stayed until Wednesday 10/12 @ 4:00pm

9:31 AM Defendant Steven R. Daniels in court.  Attorney Patrick Joseph Stangl appeared by video for Steven R. Daniels.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Waived formal reading. Not guilty plea is entered. Bond to continue.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court questions the defendant. Court finds the def. freely and knowingly waives his right to a preliminary hearing. Argument from the parties. Court reviews complaint. Court finds probable cause.

11:32 AM Defendant Steven R. Daniels in court.  Attorney Patrick Joseph Stangl appeared by video for Steven R. Daniels.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Status from Atty Stangl-Defendant will waive the preliminary hearing. State speaks to the court.
Arraignment scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Letter/Correspondence from Justice Programs Coordinator Stephanie Villella RE: IDIP Progress Update
Preliminary hearing on May 23, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:05 AM Defendant, Steven R. Daniels appeared. Attorney Patrick Joseph Stangl appeared by phone means for Defendant Steven R. Daniels. Prosecuting Atty Aaron B Marcoux appeared for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Waived reading. Set for preliminary hearing. Waived time limits. Bond to continue.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 11:30 am.
